articles.author: Sheen Kachroo
articles.title: Rains Likely in TN, Odisha Among These States for Next 48 Hrs; Delhi AQI 'Severe' Again | Weather Updates - News18
articles.description: Australia and South Africa will keep a close eye on weather forecast as a spell of steady shower is threatening to play spoilsport in the second World Cup semi-final between the two in Kolkata on Thursday
articles.content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) on Wednesday predicted heavy rains in several states, including Andhra Pradesh, Odisha, and West Bengal over the next 48 hours due to the intensification of … [+2610 chars]
